message_1:
A math student is performing an experiment to measure the heights of 10 students in their class. However, they notice that one student has a height that is significantly different from the other measurements. Using robust statistics, they want to find the median height of the remaining 9 students. 

Here are the 10 height measurements (in inches): 

{63, 61, 64, 65, 61, 63, 62, 61, 68, 58} 

What is the median height of the remaining 9 students after removing the outlier?
